title: Creating a Music Streaming Backend Like Spotify Using MongoDB
dc:creator: WoolDoughnut310
description:
This article was published as a part of the Data Science Blogathon. Introduction You must have seen streaming services such as Spotify, Deezer, and Apple Music. So, what better way to flex our backend skills than to work with MongoDB to create our own Spotify backend clone, all with NodeJS? In this article, I will […]

The post Creating a Music Streaming Backend Like Spotify Using MongoDB appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.
